Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This unique item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its exceptional quality and craftsmanship, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to acquire this masterpiece at a special price of $15000. I trust this opportunity will meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
